named-query.name: ANALYZE_FOR_LAPSED_DONOR
named-query.query: SELECT gift.person.id FROM com.mpower.domain.Gift gift WHERE gift.amount > 0 AND (gift.transactionDate BETWEEN :beginDate AND :currentDate))

named-query.name: SET_LAPSED_DONOR
named-query.query: UPDATE com.mpower.domain.Person person SET person.lapsedDonor = TRUE WHERE person.id = :personId

named-query.name: READ_ALL_PEOPLE_BY_SITE
named-query.query: SELECT person FROM com.mpower.domain.Person person WHERE site = :site

named-query.name: READ_PERSON_BY_LOGIN_ID
named-query.query: SELECT person FROM com.mpower.domain.Person person WHERE person.loginId = :loginId AND site.id = :siteId
